issue.title: Organizing the many rules for op.gg
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There is an `op.gg` section.
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/6d0b94df8ffe1b13ec0b7eecdf98f22ecee12ee0/BaseFilter/sections/specific.txt#L19256
I believe it should move the rules there.

Additionally, `na.op.gg` redirects to `op.gg`, so I believe it should remove `na` from the rule.
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/6d0b94df8ffe1b13ec0b7eecdf98f22ecee12ee0/BaseFilter/sections/specific.txt#L665

 

### Proposed solution

move the rules and remove `na` from the rule.

### Additional information

Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.38.0

  • Add MD059/descriptive-link-text
  • Improve MD025/MD027/MD036/MD038/MD041/MD043/MD045/MD051/MD052
  • markdown-it parser no longer a production dependency (breaking change)
    • Add markdownItFactory option, remove markdownItPlugins option
  • Remove support for end-of-life Node version 18
  • Improve performance
  • Update dependencies
Commits
  • 224987d Update to version 0.38.0.
  • 8cb8f6c Bump @​eslint/js from 9.25.1 to 9.26.0
  • a1506e7 Bump eslint from 9.25.1 to 9.26.0
  • b393508 Bump ava from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0
  • 738f4aa Update test repo snapshots.
  • 979419c Remove support for end-of-life Node 18 (continued).
  • 4d8e79d Remove support for end-of-life Node 18 (continued).
  • 6adfaf6 Update MD025/single-title and MD051/link-fragments to ignore headings that ex...
  • a4b7ffa Remove support for end-of-life Node 18.
  • f34f4dd Update Checkers workflow to ignore all github.com links because they return H...
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.37.4&new-version=0.38.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Recommendations for Adguard Chinese filters
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

在Adguard浏览器扩展中有好几个与中文相关的过滤器，我觉得可以合并成一个过滤器。目前Adguard中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以合并其它过滤器。

### Proposed solution

如图，下面这两个过滤器也是负责中文内容的，可以与Adguard 中文过滤器合并。现在的中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以改成同时基于三个过滤器
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/97d933a4-38aa-4fee-a15c-1fa5eaab4307)

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
> 你好。不明白这个想法。请解释一下。

adguard中文过滤器是基于easylistchina规则列表的，在easylistchina的基础上加上你们自己的规则组合而成。但是adguard广告过滤扩展中还含有另外两个负责中文内容的广告过滤器，分别是截图中的两个过滤器。我的建议就是将图中的两个过滤器与easylistchina再加上你们自己的规则，组成adguard中文过滤器

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gio.com.au/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gio.com.au%2F) ### Comment > Running Google Chrome to access GIO Insurance website. > With Adguard enabled, we cannot login via the My Account option. issue.title: Recommendations for Adguard Chinese filters
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

在Adguard浏览器扩展中有好几个与中文相关的过滤器，我觉得可以合并成一个过滤器。目前Adguard中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以合并其它过滤器。

### Proposed solution

如图，下面这两个过滤器也是负责中文内容的，可以与Adguard 中文过滤器合并。现在的中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以改成同时基于三个过滤器
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/97d933a4-38aa-4fee-a15c-1fa5eaab4307)
